Commerce platform

Out-of-the-box Scalable Commerce Experiences

Configurable, and composable commerce solution to rapidly deploy and scale unique brand experiences, product offerings, and services.

  • Request Demo

Experience management

Create modern buying experiences across all digital touchpoints with our frontend experience platform powered by{" "} fabric XM and{" "} fabric Storefront. Quickly launch digital storefronts and experiences with prebuilt design components that are adaptable to your brand.

{" "}
{" "}
{/* */}
{" "}
{" "}

Management platform

Manage your entire technology stack from a single e-commerce management platform called CoPilot. Powered by{" "} fabric PIM,{" "} fabric OMS, and{" "} fabric Offers for managing products, prices, promotions, inventory, and orders across all sales channels.

{/* */}

Commerce APIs

Scale without limits using a full suite of{" "} Commerce APIs to realize the power of{" "} headless commerce {" "} and simplify your ability to sell anywhere. Commerce APIs let developers enable differentiated business models and experiences.

{" "}
{" "}
{/* */}
{" "}

Design tools

An ultra-fast and configurable storefront to meet your brands experience and service level expectations. A page builder for your marketing team to deliver rich and dynamic updates to your site without developers.

{" "}

Merchant tools

A full suite of tools to manage search, customers, segments, products, prices, promotions, inventory, orders, and automations to ensure one common view across your sales channels.

{" "}

Multichannel management

On one platform, manage multiple storefronts, B2C and B2B customer segments, and distributed shopping across social, marketplaces, and your own destination properties.

{" "}

Order management

Get a single, immutable view of all orders across your sales channels to enable flexible shopping and fulfillment methods such as buy online, pickup in store, ship from store, and direct shipping.

{" "}

Checkout & payment tools

A fully configurable cart, checkout, tax, risk management, and payment capabilities to give your customers choice, flexibility, and secured trust.

{" "}

Configuration & automation

Configure your business policies, roles & access, workflows, business rules, reporting, settings, and automation rules to provide a unique service level and experience based on your business needs.
